text: Cliff Osmond (Clifford Osman Ebrahim, February 26, 1937 - December 22, 2012) was an American actor, screenwriter, director, writer, and producer who is known for his roles in Irma la Douce, The Fortune Cookie, and in Kiss Me Stupid. ==Early and personal life== Osmond was born on February 26, 1937 in Jersey City, New Jersey. He was raised in Union City, New Jersey. Osmond studied at Dartmouth College and at the University of California, Los Angeles. He was married to Gretchen Ebrahim from the 1950s until his death in 2012. They had two children, Margaret and Eric Ebrahim. ==Career== Osmond's career would begin in 1961 in the television show The Riffleman. Then he would appear in other movies such as Wild and Wonderful, Three Guns for Texas, Invation of the Bee Girls, The Front Page, The Great Brain, The North Avenue Irregulars, and in his last well-known role in For Which He Stands in 1996. After he stopped acting and later he began to direct and produce shows or television movies. He directed his last movie before his death Bxx: Haunted in 2012. ==Death== Osmond died on December 22, 2012 in his home in Pacific Palisades, California from pancreatic cancer, aged 75. ==Some movies== *Irma La Douce (1963) *Wild and Wonderful (1964) *Kiss Me, Stupid (1964) *The Fortune Cookie (1966) *Three Guns for Texas (1968) *Invasion of the Bee Girls (1973) *The Front Page (1974) *Sharks' Treasure (1975) *The Great Brain (1978) *The Apple Dumpling Gang Rides Again (1979) *The North Avenue Irregulars (1979) *For Which He Stands (1996) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American radio actors Category:American radio personalities Category:American screenwriters Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television personalities Category:American television producers Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Jewish American actors Category:Writers from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Actors from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:People from Union City, New Jersey
title: Cliff Osmond
